content: 4 st 2sc around ch6 space *single_crochet in double_crochet single_crochet in ch1 space* repeat 2x single_crochet in double_crochet 2sc in ch6 space should have 11 single_crochet total chain 6 *skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch2 * repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch3 12 ch5 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space a nose and eye sockets ch8 skip 4 st single_crochet in the first 4 single_crochet chain 5 skip 3 st single_crochet in the last 4 st slip_stitch around ch6 space chain 8 turn single_crochet into ch5 space chain 8 slip_stitch around ch8 space now you should see the start of two eye sockets the 2 ch8 and a nose ch5 b ch1 turn single_crochet in each loop of the ch8 single_crochet in the single_crochet around the ch5 single_crochet in each loop of the ch8 c ch8 *skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space skip 4 st ch2* repeat until the end of the round 3dc in last ch2 space slip_stitch into 3rd loop of the ch5 13 ch3 3dc around ch2 space 4dc around ch6 space chain 6 skip first two st on skull single_crochet in next 5 sc3tog where eye sockets join single_crochet in next 5 st chain 6 4dc around ch6 space *ch2 skip 4 st hooke�b�maxin� 4dc around ch2 space* repeat until the end of the round 3dc in the last ch2 space slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch3 14 ch5 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space 4dc around ch6 space chain 6 skip first 3 st on eye socket single_crochet in next 5 chain 6 4dc around ch6 space *ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space* repeat until the end of the round 3dc around the last ch2 space slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch5 15 ch3 3dc around ch2 space ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around ch6 ch2 skip over the skull 4dc around ch6 *ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space* repeat until you reach the end of the round ch2 and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch3 16 ch5 counts as a double_crochet + ch2 *skip 4 st 4 double_crochet around the ch2 space ch2* repeat until you reach the end of the round 3 double_crochet in the last ch2 space and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch5 17 ch3 3dc around the ch2 space *ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space* repeat until you reach the end of the round ch2 slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch3 18 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 3 st *2sc around ch2 space single_crochet in next 4 st* repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch into first single_crochet 19 ch1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each st of the round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet 20 ch1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in the next 5 st *placing a d-ring
